alert.note: Alert for Madison (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 3:39AM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch today. Additional snow from Lake Effect tonight from 1 to 7 inches with the highest amounts in far northern portions of Madison county. * WHERE... Madison county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
